'''''Poems and Songs of Middle Earth''''' is a collection of verses from ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'' read by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], together with [[Donald Swann]]'s (piano) and [[William Elvin]]'s (song) performance of ''[[The Road Goes Ever On (book)
thumb]]: The Road Goes Ever On]]'', issued by [[Wikipedia:Caedmon Audio
column4: gramophone record]] in [[1967]]. Tolkien recorded the verses on [[15 June]] [[1967]].<ref name=CG>{{CG

The front of the album cover features an illustration by [[Pauline Baynes]], and on the back [[W.H. Auden]] contributed with an introduction to Tolkien.
